content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Dear Yi-Nuo Wang, as Mr. Schmidt during our negotiation, I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's focus on discussing the rental price for now. To start, I have an initial figure in mind, but I'm open to hearing your proposed amount.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing your openness on this matter. Currently, considering my budget and other options, I believe our mutual agreed rental price should not exceed 450 Euros per month. I look forward to hearing your response.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While understanding your budget constraints, I must emphasize my aim to achieve the highest possible rent for this prime location apartment. However, considering your proposal, I am willing to make a concession. I agree to the price of 500 Euros per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your consideration, Mr. Schmidt. While 500 Euros per month is slightly above my initial target range, I recognize the value of this apartment's location and understand negotiation dynamics. I agree to the price of 500 Euros for the monthly rent. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
